parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index after which to insert a new record

title: IHelixFeatureData.InsertRecord
description: Inserts a record before the specified index in the Region parameters table of this variable-pitch helix.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index after which to insert a new record

returns: True if the record is inserted, false if not
remarks:
When inserting a record, the SOLIDWORKS Design software calculates the new region's parameters. You cannot add a record to the beginning of the Region parameters table. To add a record to the end of the Region parameters table, use
IHelixFeatureData::AddLastRecord
.
